page.title: 16MORE BOY'S GAMES
page.content:
{Miss a Punch
In this game you have to chase after someone.When you catch him you have a "Miss a Punch".A "Miss a Punch" is when you pretend to hit him.If,when you do this he falls over and stumbles you get a free Miss a Punch and pretend to kick him.When you have caught someone and had a "Miss a Punch" the game starts again and he chases you again. { Off Ground Tag
This game is like tag but there are dens,which are all off the ground. There is a time limit to how long you stay on a den .Sometimes instead of a time limit there is a number of times you are allowed on den.
